update <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFWORKREP_LOAD_PLAN_STEP", "W") ?> set IND_UPDATE = 'U' where (LP_RUN_CD, LP_STEP_NO, LP_STEP_NAME) in ( select LP_RUN_CD, LP_STEP_NO, LP_STEP_NAME from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "WORKREP_LOAD_PLAN_STEP", "ORCL_ODI_PROCESS_DATA", "D") ?> )

update <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "WORKREP_LOAD_PLAN_STEP", "ORCL_ODI_PROCESS_DATA", "D") ?> T set ( LP_RUN_CD, LP_STEP_NO, LP_STEP_NAME, LP_STEP_TYPE, LP_STEP_LEVEL, LP_STEP_PARENT, SESS_CD ) = ( select LP_RUN_CD, LP_STEP_NO, LP_STEP_NAME, LP_STEP_TYPE, LP_STEP_LEVEL, LP_STEP_PARENT, SESS_CD from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFWORKREP_LOAD_PLAN_STEP", "W") ?> S where IND_UPDATE = 'U' and T.LP_RUN_CD =S.LP_RUN_CD and T.LP_STEP_NO =S.LP_STEP_NO and T.LP_STEP_NAME =S.LP_STEP_NAME ) where (LP_RUN_CD, LP_STEP_NO, LP_STEP_NAME) in ( select LP_RUN_CD, LP_STEP_NO, LP_STEP_NAME from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFWORKREP_LOAD_PLAN_STEP", "W") ?> where IND_UPDATE = 'U' )

SELECT to_char(add_months(sysdate, -VARIABLE_VALUE), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss') END_DATE FROM ODI_PROCESS_DATA.PROCESS_VARIABLE WHERE VARIABLE_NAME = 'ODI_LOG_RETENTION_M' AND PROCESS_CD = '#USER_PROCESS_TOOLS.V_PROCESS_CD'
